# tstsa

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This package provides data and code for the reproducible analysis of tuberculin skin test positivity among participants in the HomeACF Trial in South Africa.

This documents reports revised analysis following reviewer's comments received on 25th Feb 2020.

## Installation

You can install the released version of tstsa from [github](https://github.com/petermacp/tstsa) with:

``` r
remotes::install_github("petermacp/tstsa")
```
